snippet.title: Johnny Depp gave stars he accused Amber of cheating with cruel names, she claims
snippet.description: Johnny Depp had nicknames for a number of A-list Hollywood stars who appeared alongside Amber Heard in movies, it has been alleged.   A court was today told that "very jealous" Johnny, 57, would give nicknames to male and female stars that he thought were a "sexual threat".  They included "pumpkin head" for Leonardo DiCaprio, "potato head" for Channing Tatum and "turd" for Jim Sturgess.  The Pirates of the Caribbean actor allegedly also accused Amber of having affairs with a number of other famous faces, including Eddie Redmayne, James Franco, Liam Hemsworth, Billy-Bob Thornton and Kelli Garner.  The claims came from Amber, who started giving her evidence against her ex-husband at London's High Court today.  Read More Related Articles  Read More Related Articles   Speaking in court, Amber said: "I had to justify to him why I was doing any movie, and it was much worse if there was any kissing or a sex scene in it.  "He would try and catch me out by taking my phone or telling me someone had told him I was having an affair and act as if he had information proving it – when I really hadn't.  Read More Related Articles  Read More Related Articles   "He would taunt me about it – especially when he was drunk or high – and had derogatory nicknames for every one of my male co-stars he considered a sexual threat."  The actress continued: "He spoke possessively of me as 'my woman' and made comments that he wished he had found me before I had slept with anyone else, joking he would have locked me away at 14.   "He would obsess about how I dressed. If I wore a low-cut dress, then he would say things like 'my girl is not gonna dress like a w****.'  "Over time, I stopped wearing revealing dresses for red carpet events: it just wasn't worth the verbal and psychological abuse."  The duo are in court as he launched a libel case against News Group Newspapers after a column published in The Sun spoke of allegations of abuse from Amber against Johnny.  Johnny denies the allegations against him.
